Reviews.Content: location 2 minutes walk tram takes city 34 stops 20minutes walk main touristic attractions staff helpful breakfast lot variety continental breakfast turkish dishes clean downside size booked double extra bed barely space walk luggage day requested bigger ok wed fold extra bed morning extra bed wasnt comfortable
